Motion Controller
Version 2.34
Nov 18, 2016


==== Garbage Creation (at edit-time) ====

1. 9/28/2016 U5.4.1f:  Assigning delegates creates 104B
http://jacksondunstan.com/articles/3264

2. 9/28/2016 U5.4.1f:  Using Unity's Input.GetButtonDown() creates 406B


==== Performance (at edit-time) ====

1. 9/28/2016 U5.4.1f: 100 Unity Default + MC = 105 FPS
